title: Smart Data models company schema
description: This data model describes a company in a port.

mrn.description:
Property. MRN coded identifier. This URN should Conforms MRN & IETF specifically RFC 2141, RFC 5234, and RFC 8141. 
    The propossed format is 
    id::='urn:mrn:<PORT>:<ONSS>:community:company:id:[0-9]+' or  
    where PORT := UN/LOCODE of port, OID:= Organisation UN/LOCODE, OONSS:=Organization Name of Service, 9999999 an unique identifier that the creator of the company registry entity will identify on his sistems (i.e. a SQL row-id), 
    i.e. urn:mrn:eshuv:community:company:id:1296

legalCode.description: Property. Code of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

registeredName.description: official Name of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

alias.description: Non official Name (nickname) of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

entityType.description: type of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

address.description: Postal address of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

addressNumber.description: Postal address of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

zipCode.description: postal code of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

addressLocality.description: localization of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

addressRegion.description: localization of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

countryCode.description: country of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

email.description: email of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

telephone.description: phone number of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

active.description: status of activation of the company or entity with activities or responsabiliy in the port.

admissionDate.description: date in which the company was registered in the model.

createdAt.description: date in which the record created

modifiedAt.description: date in which the company was modified in the model.

deletedAt.description: date in which the company was delleted in the model.
